author: boris.emsheimer
title: Haibu, the pooling tool
description: The lack of intuitive DAO options for small groups of DeFi users who could benefit from pooling resources together to invest collectively
solution: To enable small groups to pool resources together and invest by generating a multisig wallet associated with a tailor-made smart contract
experience: A business consultant / IT Business Analyst with 4 years of experiences and a Javascript developer with 3 years of experiences in banking
